attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To ban the breeding, ownership or importing of Staffordshire Bull Terrier type dogs. 

To ban the breeding, ownership or import of all dogs carrying the characteristics, readily identifiable to Staffordshire Bull Terrier types and mixes of that breed even if the characteristics are not pronounced.

The breed type is purposely bred for killing other dogs and is responsible for maiming and killing large numbers of pet dogs, the breed is itself subject to more abuse than any other breed type and it is common for owners to prowl the parks and streets deliberately to set it on other dogs present.

The breed type has no place in Britain, pet dog owners have the right to walk their dog absent of any threat from a breed type bred for killing other dogs, and legislation should be made to eradicate the breed type.
